item.title: Hawks 'felt anything could happen' in manic ending, Cats bullish after 3-0 start
item.description: Hawthorn saw the 40-minute severe weather delay during Monday's game as a chance to get the match on their terms, but it wasn't to be with the Cats continuing their undefeated start to 2024
